<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.getRegClass(NewReg) != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.getRegClass(OldReg))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">                <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7f2a3d4dcfee70225988aec53ff1e173">report&#95;fatal&#95;error</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Peephole: call to builtin function with &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;wrong signature, from/to mismatch&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">              <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> |= <a href="#a838442534a7db8c9a083268f8df2d342">maybeRewriteToDrop</a>(OldReg, NewReg, MO, MFI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">            &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
